name: Freespirits Utility Workflow
description: A lightweight Node-based workflow that demonstrates npm scripts for development, building, and previewing output.

steps.title: Development readiness check
steps.details: Validates that the project metadata is accessible before running a build.

steps.title: Build artifact generation
steps.details: Transforms the project metadata into a distributable summary file in the dist directory.

steps.title: Preview generated output
steps.details: Displays the contents of the generated summary file as a quick preview.
